ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and food that chokes and a painful punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And food that will stick in the throat, and painful torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and a food that chokes, and a grievous chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: food which chokes (them), and a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And food that chokes, and a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And a food that chokes, and a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And food that chokes and a painful punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and food that chokes, and a painful chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And food which choketh (the partaker), and a painful doom
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: food that chokes and painful punishment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And a food that choketh and a torment afflictive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and a food that chokes [those who eat it], and a painful punishment [prepared for]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And a Food that chokes, and a Penalty Grievous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And a food that chokes, and a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: choking food and a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And food that chokes, and a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:13] and a food that chokes, one that causes the throat to choke, and this is [either] zaqqūm [cf. Q. 44:43], darī‘ [cf. Q. 88:6], ghislīn [cf. Q. 69:36] or thorns of fire, which can neither be vomited nor ingested, and a painful chastisement, in addition to the [punishment] mentioned, for those who deny the Prophet (s),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And food) the Zaqqum (which choketh (the partaker), and a painful doom) whose pain will extend to their hearts.
